snippet.title: Loppy: Planet Hopper - Planet 1 DEMO Trailer | QQnut Games
snippet.description:
PLAY THE DEMO! - https://qqnut.itch.io/loppy-planet-hopper

LISTEN TO THE SOUNDTRACK! - https://edwardkstuart.bandcamp.com/album/loppy-planet-hopper-pst

Join Loppy, and her friends, on an out-of-this-world 2D platforming adventure where you'll travel to various themed planets, run through levels, jump over obstacles, stomp and punch evil businessmen, find ingredients, discover secrets, and save the galaxy (also your own bakery), from the clutches of an evil corporation.

Loppy: Planet Hopper is a 2D platformer with a 16-bit in-game art style that takes inspiration from many classic 2D platformers from the '90s.

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - 
Welcome to QQnut Games!
I am an indie game developer located in Colombia, South America, I've been making games since 2017, and it's always been my dream to make them ever since I was a wee little monkey.

Follow me on Twitter: https://twitter.com/qqnutgames
Follow me on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/qqnutgames/
